flawed_nl_solution:
Hansel makes $30000 and received a 10% raise so his raise is 30000*0.1 = $3000
Hansel now makes 30000+ 3000 = $<<30000+3000=30300>>30300 a year
Gretel makes $30000 and received a 15% raise so her raise is 30000*0.15 = $4500
Gretel now makes 30000+4500 = $<<30000+4500=34500>>34500 a year
If Gretel makes $34500 a year and Hansel makes $30300 then Gretel makes 34500-30300 = $<<34500-30300=4200>>4200 more a year than Hansel

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 33000.0, not 30300.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
